This is the newest Roblox face in our lineup!

The Chill Face
The chill face has been made popular by a certain Youtuber who made this face a running joke in his videos. Ever since the face has often been used on avatars because of this joke and it is also free to use which is a great advantage for most users since a lot do not spend money on Roblox.

The main features of this face are that this face looks a lot more relaxed then other faces, hence the "chill" in the name.

Summary: This Roblox face doesn't have much to it but the look is still good and it's free.
Roblox Face rating: 8/10

Stay tuned for more Cool Roblox faces!
